youtubeVideoDescription.name: Youtube Video Description
youtubeVideoDescription.desc: An AI tool that generates youtube video description from your information

aiPrompt.skills: Creating engaging content, understanding YouTube trends, SEO writing, Rich Text formatting
aiPrompt.context: I have the plan and the title of the YouTube video. My goal is to get video description ideas that capture attention and improve SEO.
aiPrompt.task: Generate YouTube video description ideas based on the given plan and title.

process.step1: Analyze the provided video plan and title.
process.step2: Generate several captivating and SEO-optimized description ideas.
process.step3: Integrate emojis to make the descriptions more attractive.
process.step4: Format the descriptions using a Rich Text Editor.

aiPrompt.characteristics: The descriptions should be engaging, relevant, SEO-optimized, and properly formatted in Rich Text. They should also include appropriate emojis.

youtubeVideoIdea.name: Youtube Video Idea
youtubeVideoIdea.desc: An AI tool that generates Youtube Video Idea based on given information

aiPrompt.skills: Generating creative ideas, understanding YouTube trends, ability to format in Rich Text
aiPrompt.context: I provide a specific niche and topic. My goal is to obtain YouTube video ideas that are relevant and engaging.
aiPrompt.task: Propose a YouTube video idea based on the given niche and topic.

process.step1: Analyze the given niche and topic.
process.step2: Generate several relevant and engaging video ideas.
process.step3: Format the ideas using a Rich Text Editor.

aiPrompt.characteristics: The ideas should be creative, relevant to the niche and topic, and properly formatted in Rich Text.

instagramHashtags.name: Instagram Hashtags
instagramHashtags.desc: An AI tool that generates Instagram hashtags based on your post niche and outline information

aiPrompt.skills: Knowledge of Instagram trends, research and generation of relevant hashtags, ability to format in Rich Text
aiPrompt.context: I provide a specific niche and topic. My goal is to obtain good examples of relevant and effective Instagram hashtags.
aiPrompt.task: Propose good examples of Instagram hashtags based on the given niche and topic.

process.step1: Analyze the given niche and topic.
process.step2: Research and generate several examples of relevant and popular hashtags.
process.step3: Format the hashtags using a Rich Text Editor.

aiPrompt.characteristics: The hashtags should be relevant, popular, optimized for reach, and properly formatted in Rich Text.

process.step1: Analyze the given niche and topic.

linkedinPost.name: Linkedin Post
linkedinPost.desc: An AI tool that generates Linkedin Post idea based on your post niche and outline information

aiPrompt.skills: Knowledge of LinkedIn trends, generation of relevant content ideas, ability to format in Rich Text
aiPrompt.context: I provide a specific niche and topic. My goal is to obtain good ideas for relevant and engaging LinkedIn posts.
aiPrompt.task: Propose good ideas for LinkedIn posts based on the given niche and topic.

process.step1: Analyze the given niche and topic.
process.step2: Generate several relevant and engaging post ideas.
process.step3: Format the ideas using a Rich Text Editor.

aiPrompt.characteristics: The ideas should be relevant, engaging, optimized for LinkedIn, and properly formatted in Rich Text.

tweet.name: Tweet
tweet.desc: An AI tool that generates Linkedin Post idea based on your post niche and outline information

aiPrompt.skills: Knowledge of Twitter trends, concise and impactful writing, optimization for engagement, ability to use emojis appropriately, Rich Text formatting
aiPrompt.context: I provide a specific niche and topic. My goal is to obtain an example of a relevant and engaging tweet with a maximum of 280 characters.
aiPrompt.task: Propose an example of a tweet with 280 characters based on the given niche and topic.

process.step1: Analyze the given niche and topic.
process.step2: Write a concise and impactful tweet that respects the 280 character limit.
process.step3: Integrate emojis to make the tweet more attractive and engaging.
process.step4: Format the tweet using a Rich Text Editor.

aiPrompt.characteristics: The tweet should be relevant, engaging, optimized for Twitter engagement, properly formatted in Rich Text, and include appropriate emojis, all while respecting the 280 character limit.
